amendment.description: An amendment numbered 22 printed in Part D of House Report 117-241 to direct the State Department, in coordination with Department of Energy and in consultation with appropriate agencies, to report on the impact of US sanctions on innovation, emissions reduction, climate cooperation, and economic justice.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to direct the State Department, in coordination with Department of Energy and in consultation with appropriate agencies, to report on the impact of US sanctions on innovation, emissions reduction, climate cooperation, and economic justice.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A005) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 181 - 248 (Roll no. 21).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A005) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Jayapal.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A005) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 181 - 248 (Roll no. 21).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A005) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 181 - 248 (Roll no. 21).
